Rockruff (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0743: Ribombee
Pokémon
#0745: Lycanroc →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Rockruff (TCG Pocket).

Rockruff has been featured on 15 different cards since it debuted as one of the SM Black Star Promos of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Rockruff cards are normally Fighting-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Rockruff

Rockruff
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
